Name: Sweet and Sour Pork with Rice
Description: A dish made of pork, rice, and sweet-sour sauce.

NameLocalization.ru: Свинина в кисло-сладком соусе с рисом
NameLocalization.tr: Pirinçle Tatlı ve Ekşi Domuz Eti

DescriptionLocalization.ko: 밥 위에 새콤달콤한 탕수육을 듬뿍 올렸습니다.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Un plat de porc dans une sauce aigre-douce servi sur un lit de riz.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: ご飯に豚肉と甘酸っぱいタレを乗せた料理。
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Блюдо из свинины, риса и кисло-сладкого соуса.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Domuz eti, pirinç ile tatlı ve ekşi sostan yapılan bir yemek.
